name: Shotcrete (V140421)
Prior to Commencing Works
Ensure zone for shotcrete has been excavated
Confirm reinforcement has not moved by concrete placement
Confirm that all mesh has bar chairs tied to steel to prevent dislodgement during shotcrete works
Confirm that reinforcement has been installed in accordance to structural engineer details prior to arranging for site inspection
Where recessed column is located, confirm that reinforcement installation allows for rebated shoring zone
Confirm that min 300mm lap has been provided for mesh and plastic membrane at typical horizontal control joint
Confirm no blow-outs have occurred
Confirm core drain has been installed in accordance with specifications
Confirm plastic membrane to rear face of shotcrete wall has been lapped and taped at joints
Confirm that structural engineer has completed inspection and provided signoff (incl defect closeouts)
Engineer inspections attached/referenced below
Confirm that inspection photos are taken and attached below
Shotcrete Works
Confirm that shotcrete is applied evenly in layers to avoid honeycombing
Ensure that shotcrete wall is troweled to agreed finish
Obtain subcontractor’s installation ITPs and shotcrete mix dockets
Attached/referenced below as applicable
Sign-Off
Attach Subcontractor ITP - Attached below as applicable
Subcontractor Sign Off
Aland Sign Off
Click to add Sign-Off Signatures
